abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Highway Project will help
            finance the detailed engineering and reconstruction of the
            Mpika-Tunduma section (235 miles) of the Great North Road,
            and the detailed engineering of the Luangwa River-Myimba
            section (63 miles) of the Great East Road.
